markdownRemark.html:
Hi, I'm Arpit. I am a product-obsessed engineer and designer based in New York City. ğŸ—½ Currently, I work as a software engineer at WeWork.

I've built products and led teams in energetic, creative, and technical environments. Previously, I founded my own startup, Crater. I went to Cornell University for undergrad and am also a graduate from the Cornell Tech Master of Engineering program.



I've been teaching myself web development since 2008. I built this website to practice my craft, iterate on ideas, and learn from potential mistakes along the way. Please share your thoughts with me or see what's under the hood.
